comment: * This class implements the traversers for DTMDefaultBase.

methods.name: public DTMAxisIterator getTypedAxisIterator(int axis, int type)
methods.comment:
* Get an iterator that can navigate over an XPath Axis, predicated by
   * the extended type ID.
   * Returns an iterator that must be initialized
   * with a start node (using iterator.setStartNode()).
   *
   * @param axis One of Axes.ANCESTORORSELF, etc.
   * @param type An extended type ID.
   *
   * @return A DTMAxisIterator, or null if the given axis isn't supported.

methods.name: public DTMAxisIterator getAxisIterator(final int axis)
methods.comment:
* This is a shortcut to the iterators that implement the
   * XPath axes.
   * Returns a bare-bones iterator that must be initialized
   * with a start node (using iterator.setStartNode()).
   *
   * @param axis One of Axes.ANCESTORORSELF, etc.
   *
   * @return A DTMAxisIterator, or null if the given axis isn't supported.

methodNames: public DTMAxisIterator getTypedAxisIterator(int axis, int type)
